00023 #ifndef __NITF_HANDLE_MANAGER_HPP__
00024 #define __NITF_HANDLE_MANAGER_HPP__
00025 
00026 #include <string>
00027 #include <map>
00028 #include <import/sys.h>
00029 #include <import/mt.h>
00030 #include "nitf/Handle.hpp"
00031 
00032 namespace nitf
00033 {
00034 class HandleManager
00035 {
00036 private:
00037     typedef void* CAddress;
00038 
00039     std::map<CAddress, Handle*> mHandleMap; 
00040     sys::Mutex mMutex; 
00041 
00042 public:
00043     HandleManager() {}
00044     virtual ~HandleManager() {}
00045 
00046     template <typename T>
00047     bool hasHandle(T* object)
00048     {
00049         if (!object) return false;
00050         mt::CriticalSection<sys::Mutex> obtainLock(&mMutex);
00051         return mHandleMap.find(object) != mHandleMap.end();
00052     }
00053 
00054     template <typename T, typename DestructFunctor_T>
00055     BoundHandle<T, DestructFunctor_T>* acquireHandle(T* object)
00056     {
00057         if (!object) return NULL;
00058         mt::CriticalSection<sys::Mutex> obtainLock(&mMutex);
00059         if (mHandleMap.find(object) == mHandleMap.end())
00060         {
00061             BoundHandle<T, DestructFunctor_T>* handle =
00062                 new BoundHandle<T, DestructFunctor_T>(object);
00063             mHandleMap[object] = handle;
00064         }
00065         BoundHandle<T, DestructFunctor_T>* handle =
00066             (BoundHandle<T, DestructFunctor_T>*)mHandleMap[object];
00067         handle->incRef();
00068         return handle;
00069     }
00070 
00071     template <typename T>
00072     void releaseHandle(T* object)
00073     {
00074         mt::CriticalSection<sys::Mutex> obtainLock(&mMutex);
00075         std::map<CAddress, Handle*>::iterator it = mHandleMap.find(object);
00076         if (it != mHandleMap.end())
00077         {
00078             Handle* handle = (Handle*)it->second;
00079             if (handle->decRef() <= 0)
00080             {
00081                 delete handle;
00082                 mHandleMap.erase(it);
00083             }
00084         }
00085     }
00086 };
00087 
00096 typedef mt::Singleton<HandleManager, false> HandleRegistry;
00097 
00098 }
00099 #endif
